app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Language Translator Translate
app_description: This is a perfect Language Translator app with all related functionalities to provide users with a real time translation aid. This is a text and voice translation app that helps translate text from photos you can capture and translate text and by voice as well. It brilliantly allows for translation from any language to up to 100 languages. This app is a Real time voice Language Translator for your everyday needs. The live translator of it is best at instant translations using the live camera translator from inside the app. This is a Voice to Text translator Text to Voice Language Translator app to bring ease into everyday communications with people from different regions of the world. You can change the language preferences and other settings of the app anytime you want. Camera translator Simply move to the camera translator tab and choose an image from the gallery to translate text from it or use a live camera translator for translating any current image. Also use a scanner to scan any physical document and translate it instantly. Voice Translator This voice Language Translator app is so convenient to make voice translation from one to other multiple languages. You can play audio translated version of your query in seconds and copy and share it with anyone at the moment. Also you can keep it maintained in the history or delete it as per your preferences. Text to Voice translator You can type to get the audio translation on the go. This is real time multifunctional translation aid that anyone can require. History Maintenance Move to the history tab and get the recent translated versions to be viewed from there. Also you can delete any translations from there if you don t want them anymore. Why we like it: Live camera translator. Image text translator. Scanning and translation. All languages translator app. Voice translator. Text to voice translator. Proper history maintenance. Real time translation convenience. Supported languages: Afrikaans Amharic Arabic Armenian Azerbaycan Basque Bengali Bulgarian Catalan Croatian Czech Chinese Danish Dutch English Filipino French Finnish Galician Georgian Hindi Tamil German Greek Hebrew Hungarian Indonesian Icelandic Italian Japanese Khmer Korean Latvian Thai Lithuanian Malay Nepali Norwegian Persian Portuguese Romanian Russian Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Serbian Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Vietnamese.
